Resends an email verification email to the user (only valid if the email is not already verified)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"email":"cercei.lannister@theopenlane.io"}}},"schema":{"properties":{"email":{"description":"The email address to resend the verification email to, must match the email address on the existing account","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"ResendRequest"}}}}}
>

</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"examples":{"success":{"value":{"success":true,"message":"Email has been resent"}}},"schema":{"properties":{"error":{"description":"The error message if the request was unsuccessful","type":"string"},"error_code":{"description":"The error code if the request was unsuccessful","type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"success":{"description":"Whether or not the request was successful or not","type":"boolean"},"unverified":{"type":"boolean"}},"type":"object","title":"ResendReply"}}},"description":"Success"},"400":{"description":"Bad Request"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error"},"default":{"description":""}}}
>

</StatusCodes>
